name: KFME
body:
### About
Kepler Fitting Made Easy is a Graphical User Interface written in [IDL](http://www.exelisvis.com/ProductsServices/IDL.aspx). Originally created to model astrometric and radial velocity data simultaneously for NASA's [Space Interferometry Mission](http://science.nasa.gov/missions/sim/). The call for the proposal can be found here, and a summary of the results can be found [here](http://neat.obs.ujf-grenoble.fr/presentations_ws2013/Traub_NEAT_27May2013a.pdf).

### Documentation
A wiki with more information on KFME can be found [here](https://sites.google.com/site/kfmeasy/).

### Citing KFME
If you've made use of KFME in your research, please cite
[Giguere et al. 2012, ApJ, 744, 4](http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2012ApJ...744....4G)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
